result.title: Translating Codeforces problems
result.content:
Hello, Codeforces!

In most Arabian countries, people can not practice competitive programming in Codeforces because they do not understand English or Russian. This problem affects them badly and lead them to use translator which will not lead them to a successful translation. Learning English is an alternative way for them to practise, but it is not a solution for this problems.

I believe that there are many volunteers who can translate new contests to their language making Codeforces better place for most countries. But even after eight years, that did not happen.

What do you think about it? Is translating new contests to other languages a good idea?
